config.name: configurare
config.description: A collection of admin-only configuration commands

automod-toggle.name: automod-toggle
automod-toggle.description: Enable or disable AutoMod checks in channel names

toggle.name: toggle
toggle.description: Either enable or disable AutoMod checks

automod-logto.name: automod-logto
automod-logto.description: Set the channel to log AutoMod violations to

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to send messages to, omit to disable

export.name: export
export.description: Export this server's config as a json file.

import.name: import
import.description: Modify this server's configuration by uploading a json config file.

create-channel.name: Creează-canal
create-channel.description: Set the voice channel users will join to create a dynamic voice channel

channel.name: canal
channel.description: The voice channel users will join

default-lobby-size.name: mărime implicită-lobby-ului
default-lobby-size.description: Set the default user limit when a new dynamic channel is created

size.name: size
size.description: The default number of users allowed to join a channel, set to 0 for unlimited.

max-lobby-size.name: mărime maximă de lobby
max-lobby-size.description: Set the maximum number of users that can join a dynamic channel

size.name: mărime
size.description: The max number of users allowed to join a channel, set to 0 for unlimited.

max-lobby-count.name: max-lobby-count
max-lobby-count.description: Set the maximum number of dynamic channels that can exist in your server

count.name: count
count.description: The max number of dynamic channels, set to 0 for unlimited.

set-grace-period.name: - perioadă de grație
set-grace-period.description: Set the amount of time to wait before considering a voice channel abandoned.

deafened-toggle.name: Comutator de surzire
deafened-toggle.description: Enable or disable allowing server deafened users to own channels

toggle.name: comutator
toggle.description: Ori activați sau dezactivați verificările de AutoMod

muted-toggle.name: Comutator de mut
muted-toggle.description: Enable or disable allowing server muted users to own channels

toggle.name: comutator
toggle.description: Either allow or deny server muted ownership

add-ownership-role.name: add-ownership-role
add-ownership-role.description: Add a role for users that are allowed to own a dynamic channel

role.name: rol
role.description: The default number of users allowed to join a channel, set to 0 for unlimited.

remove-ownership-role.name: remove-ownership-role
remove-ownership-role.description: Remove a role for users that are allowed to own a dynamic channel

limit.name: limită
limit.description: Change the user limit for a voice channel you own.

limit.name: limită
limit.description: The max number of users that can join this channel, must be between 1 and 99, set to 0 for infinite.

locale.name: locale
locale.description: Set the locale for a voice channel you own

locale.name: locale
locale.description: The locale to set your voice channel responses to

rename.name: redenumește
rename.description: Rename a voice channel you own.

new-name.name: Nume nou
new-name.description: The new name of your channel, must be between 1 and 50 characters long.

transfer.name: transferă
transfer.description: Transfer ownership of a voice channel you own to another user.

user.name: utilizator
user.description: Select a user in your voice channel to transfer ownership to

claim.name: claim
claim.description: Claim ownership of an abandoned channel.
